ingredients: +   1/4 cup peanuts, 2  Thai chiles, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tablespoon dried shrimp, 1 tablespoon white sugar, 2 medium limes, juiced, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1 medium papaya - peeled, seeded, and sliced, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved,   +   1/4 cup fresh green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces,   +   1/2 medium carrot, peeled and shredded,   salt and ground black pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Cholesterol 5mg 2%, Sodium 1126mg 49%, Total Carbohydrate 37g 14%, Dietary Fiber 7g 26%, Total Sugars 17g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 197mg 985%, Calcium 89mg 7%, Iron 2mg 12%, Potassium 855mg 18%
